title: Chalice Cover, mid-17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: grid of withdrawn work with reticella style needle lace, embroidery and bobbin lace trim
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Chalice cover edged by Venetian bobbin lace of elaborate triangles. Cover is ornamented by wide insertion of reticella. Pattern geometric in character.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chalice Cover, mid-17th century.
mid-17th century. Medium: linen
Technique: grid of withdrawn work with reticella style needle lace, embroidery and bobbin lace trim. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-131.
